    • java.lang.Throwable

        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.errors.RuntimeError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsError, AssertionFailure, ConversionError, FileAlreadyExistsError, FileIOError, FileUtil.FileException, IllegalArgumentError, NoSuchFileError, UninitializedInstanceError, UnknownFileHandleError, YailRuntimeError

    public abstract class RuntimeError
extends RuntimeException
    Superclass of all Simple runtime errors.
